extensionDescription.message: Free PiP button for YouTube player controls. Pop out video over any app, even outside Chrome.
extensionDescription.description: The description of the extension shown in the store and chrome://extensions.

tooltipEnter.description: Tooltip shown on the PiP button when PiP is not active.

tooltipExit.description: Tooltip shown on the PiP button when PiP is active.

ariaLabel.description: Accessible label for the PiP button.

commandTogglePip.description: Description of the keyboard shortcut command.
